tag: {generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"The Forbidden Wing of the library had long been ignored by the OCWers. They were off to different worlds and adventures. However, the dark magic in that wing of the library had never been defeated. In fact it was growing. Expanding."}','{"text":"The Forbidden Wing expanded out in all directions, attempting to reclaim its former glory, restore its power, and get revenge on the OCWers that abandoned it."}']}
